unnormalised: Hey, this is interesting! My grandmother always swore by Ayurvedic treatments. I remember her trip to Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala. She said it did wonders for her joint pain. I've been thinking of trying something myself. Maybe for stress? Heard abhyanga is good. Anyone tried it? Happy Onam to all by the way! Hope you are eating good biryani and payasams!
